name: Dark Patterns: Forevergram
description:
Dark Patterns: Forevergram is part of a 2-part series exploring the design psychology of Dark Patterns. Check out Innes White's game Dark Patterns: Unashamed!

Forevergram was created by Neve O'Neill during a 20 day internship for UNESCO City of Design Dundee.

This game was sponsored by InGAMEand created as part of Dundee Design Festival 2021 for the online Design House. Dundee Design Festival is a UNESCO City of Design Dundee project delivered through the Dundee Partnership and hosted by the V&A Dundee.

For more work from Neve, take a look at their Itch.io page, Games portfolio or Twitter.
